subject: Our lender will be calling you soon to perform a welcome call

rows.text: You've signed the delivery note and will now receive a welcome call from our lender, Propensio. Your builder may not get paid on time if you don't complete this welcome call.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
